meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inchoate.
meanings.sent1: The inchoateness of the project made it difficult to determine its direction.
meanings.sent2: The inchoateness of the plan required further development before implementation.
meanings.sent3: The inchoateness of the puzzle left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled in a whirlwind of inchoateness, waiting to be organized.
meanings.sent5: The inchoateness of the painting gave it a mysterious and unfinished charm.

meanings.sent1: At the inchoateness of the journey, they were full of excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent2: The inchoateness of the project signaled the beginning of a new era.
meanings.sent3: The inchoateness of the recipe left room for culinary experimentation.
meanings.sent4: In the inchoateness of dawn, the world seemed full of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The inchoateness of a seed holds the promise of future growth and beauty.
